actions.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Lieberman. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
subjects: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

summary.text: Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs for the 110th Congress.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
